title: Here's a list of 20 articles on emotion analysis in texts, covering various approaches and advancements up to 2023
note: These articles include foundational works, recent advancements, and applications in the field:

title: **"Sentiment Analysis and Opinion Mining"** by Bing Liu
- A foundational paper that provides an overview of sentiment analysis techniques
**"Deep Learning for Sentiment Analysis: A Survey"** by Yoon Kim
- Discusses the application of deep learning methods to sentiment analysis
**"Affective Text: A Study of Emotion Analysis and Recognition"** by Carlo Strapparava and Rada Mihalcea
- Explores early methods for emotion recognition in text
**"EmoLex: A Lexical Resource for Emotion Analysis"** by Saif M
- Introduces a lexical resource for emotion analysis
Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"** by Jacob Devlin et al
- While not solely about emotion analysis, BERT has been widely used for emotion detection tasks
**"A Survey on Sentiment and Emotion Analysis for Computational Literary Studies"** by David Bamman et al
- Reviews sentiment and emotion analysis in the context of literary studies
**"Emotion Recognition from Text: A Survey"** by Erik Cambria et al
- Provides a comprehensive survey of emotion recognition techniques
- Discusses the use of contextualized word embeddings for emotion detection
**"Emotion Detection from Text: Challenges and Opportunities"** by Erik Cambria et al
- Explores the challenges and future directions in emotion detection
- Discusses the intersection of affective computing and sentiment analysis
**"Emotion Analysis in Social Media: A Systematic Literature Review"** by Alexandra Balahur et al
- Reviews emotion analysis techniques applied to social media data
**"Emotion Detection in Text: A Review"** by Erik Cambria et al
- An earlier review of emotion detection methods
**"DeepMoji: Using Deep Learning to Understand Emoji Usage"** by Bjarke Felbo et al
- Explores the use of deep learning for understanding emotions expressed through emojis
**"Emotion Recognition in Text: An Overview of Resources and Methods"**
- Provides an overview of resources and methods for emotion recognition
**"Affective Computing: From Laughter to IEEE"** by Rosalind W
- Discusses the broader field of affective computing and its applications
**"Emotion Detection from Text: A Survey"** by Erik Cambria et al
- Another comprehensive survey on emotion detection techniques
**"Emotion Analysis in Text: A Survey"** by Erik Cambria et al
- Reviews various approaches to emotion analysis in text
**"Emotion Recognition from Text Using Semantic Labels and Separable Mixture Models"** by Carlo Strapparava et al
- Discusses a method for emotion recognition using semantic labels
**"Emotion Detection in Text: A Survey"** by Erik Cambria et al
- Provides a survey of emotion detection methods and applications
**"Emotion Analysis in Text: Challenges and Opportunities"** by Erik Cambria et al
- Explores the challenges and future directions in emotion analysis
These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the field, from foundational concepts to recent advancements and applications
